title: Aashiyana.in
subtitle: Rental Property site
description: Fetch rental sites from an API. Search sites available for rent using 4 filters - Rent, BHK, Furnishing or City. Responsive design for devices of all sizes.

title: Things To-Do
subtitle: Responsive ToDo list app
description: Add, delete daily tasks or check them completed. Keep a count of completed tasks. Intially Fetches dummy tasks from API

title: Sticky Notes
subtitle: Keep your notes pasted
description: Save & delete notes (with title and message) in local storage. Search for a particular note using search box. Delete all the notes with one single click

title: The Shopkart
subtitle: An e-commerce site
description: It is a clone of e-commerce site Flipkart showing various goods to buy. It fetchs images new images on reloading the webpage..
